info.author: Christopher Auyeung
info.description: The email generator app allows you to easily generate emails for use in newsletters etc. It includes default models you can use to enter content. You then create a template which can then be selected to render the final email. Additionally contains the ability to send a test email. It allows you to use the power of Django templating along with automatically inlining CSS styles.
info.keywords: email generator, email, inline css, inline styles, email template

info.name: django_email_generator
info.summary: Email generator leverages Django to ease the task of generating email templates.
info.html_description: The email generator app allows you to easily generate emails for use in newsletters etc. It includes default models you can use to enter content. You then create a template which can then be selected to render the final email. Additionally contains the ability to send a test email. It allows you to use the power of Django templating along with automatically inlining CSS styles.
